divs: Sighting Details1- On 3-1-2004 I was at work at Disneys California Adventure and was watchingone of the bands playing.2- One of the other employees pointed the object out to me. He asked if Ithought if it might be a ballon or a helicoptor3- When I first saw the object I thought it was just a Mickey ballon. It wasjust hovering in the ski and moving slowly.4- I kept watching it because it because it didnt quite move right for a baloonand I noticed that it was moving against the wind.only the last 5 or 6 seconds of the sighting did I get excited when its shapechanged and it shot off at a very fast speed and went out of sight.5- the object was black against the ski no lights or sound that I heard. from myangle it was kind of round but at times it looked like it became more flatlooking. It was in the west but Im not sure of the distance but I would say itwas fairly high. and was slowly moving to the south. after 5 to 7 minutes itsshape turn long strait and shot of to the east and a very fast speed. It wentout of sight after about 5 or 6 seconds after moving off very fast.6- It went behind some building.
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Anaheim
There were no other sightings in Anaheim on or around March 1st 2004
